subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
* {{ja-readings
|goon=ふう, ほん
|kanon=はん, ほう
|kun=うか-ぶ}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character is not a modern Japanese character. It appears mostly in news reports of China or Taiwan issues. The character 汎 is the modern Japanese character which parallels this Chinese character in usage, such as in reports about the Pan-Blue Alliance written as 泛藍連盟 in Japanese news reports.
